org.apache.river.test.impl.outrigger.transaction

Class ReactivationTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.qa.harness.QATestEnvironment
      • org.apache.river.test.share.TestBase
        • org.apache.river.test.impl.outrigger.transaction.TransactionTestBase
          • org.apache.river.test.impl.outrigger.transaction.ReactivationTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Test, TestEnvironment

    public class ReactivationTest
extends TransactionTestBase
    RecoveryTest tests basic transactional features. This test writes an entry under a transaction, then
    • try to read/take it with no transaction, and make sure it fails.
    • try to read/take it with the same transaction, and make sure it works.
    • try to read/take it with another transaction, and make sure it fails.
    Test steps are as follows:
    1. Writes an entry under a transaction.
    2. Read/take it with no/same/different transaction.
    3. Check results.
    Author:
    H.Fukuda
